original_text: Fine linen with broidered work from Egypt was that which thou spreadest forth to be thy sail; blue and purple from the isles of Elishah was that which covered thee.
korean_text: 애굽의 수 놓은 가는 베로 돛을 만들어 깃발을 삼았음이여 엘리사 섬의 청색 자색 베로 차일을 만들었도다

sentences.original_text: Fine linen with broidered work from Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트에서 온 수绣이 있는 고급 린넨은

sentences.original_text: was that which thou spreadest forth to be thy sail
blue and purple from the isles of Elishah
